title: Wrong Place, Wrong Time - Part two.  Episode 55
itunes:subtitle: We fast forward five years to October 1994 from the last episode.  David Morley has moved from the Admiral Duncan pub in Soho to another bar in Earls Court.  In late October, he goes for a night out with a friend near Waterloo station, unaware that a g...
content:encoded:
We fast forward five years to October 1994 from the last episode. David Morley has moved from the Admiral Duncan pub in Soho to another bar in Earls Court. In late October, he goes for a night out with a friend near Waterloo station, unaware that a gang from South London are out that night, looking for a different sort of fun. And when David realises what is happening, it is too late....

Enjoy the podcast and want more? For just £3 per month listen to nine bonus episodes plus other exclusive content at www.patreon.com/uktruecrime
